title: Roasted Cauliflower with Tahini and Sriracha
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Place a rimmed baking sheet inside to preheat for 5 minutes.
Step 2: Toss cauliflower with oil, cumin, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Spread cauliflower carefully on the hot baking sheet. Set the bowl aside.
Step 3: Roast in the preheated oven until tender and starting to brown, about 15 minutes. Stir and continue roasting until evenly browned, about 5 minutes longer.
Step 4: Meanwhile, stir tahini and Sriracha sauce together in the bowl. Thin with a little water. Add hot cauliflower and stir gently to coat.
Step 5: Plate cauliflower and garnish with cilantro and sesame seeds.
